00013 /*
00014  * Unscented Filter Scheme.
00015  *  A Julier-Uhlmann Unscented non-linear Kalman filter
00016  *  Uses the classic implementation of Duplex Unscented transform.
00017  * The Unscented transform is used for non-linear state and observation predictions
00018  *
00019  * Observations are fused using innovation gain equations from a Covariance filter
00020  *
00021  * Predictions of state and state covariance (and observation) use
00022  * unscented transformations to interpolate the non-linear predict and observe
00023  * models. unscented transforms can be further optimised by vary the Kappa
00024  * parameter from its usual value of 1.
00025  * Discontinous observe models require that a normailisation function.
00026  *
00027  * The predict model is represtented by the state prediction function and a 
00028  * seperate prediction noise matrix.
00029  * The observe model is represtented by the observation prediction function and
00030  * a function to normalise observeations.
00031  *
00032  * The filter is operated by performing a
00033  *  predict, observe
00034  * cycle defined by the base class
00035  */
00036 #include "bayesFlt.hpp"
00037 
00038 /* Filter namespace */
00039 namespace Bayesian_filter
00040 {
00041 
00042 class Unscented_predict_model : public Predict_model_base
00043 /* Specific Unscented prediction model for Addative noise
00044  *  x(k|k-1) = f(x(k-1|k-1)) + w(x(k))
00045  *
00046  * Unscented filter requires
00047  *  f the function part of the non-linear model
00048  *  Q the covariance of the addative w(x(k)), w is specificly allow to be a function of state
00049  */
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     Unscented_predict_model (std::size_t q_size)
00053     {
00054         q_unscented = q_size;
00055     }
00056 
00057     virtual const FM::Vec& f(const FM::Vec& x) const = 0;
00058     // Functional part of addative model
00059     // Note: Reference return value as a speed optimisation, MUST be copied by caller.
00060 
00061     virtual const FM::SymMatrix& Q(const FM::Vec& x) const = 0;
00062     // Covariance of addative noise
00063     // Note: Reference return value as a speed optimisation, MUST be copied by caller.
00064 private:
00065     friend class Unscented_filter;  // Filter implementation need to know noise size
00066     std::size_t q_unscented;
00067 };
00068 
00069 
00070 class Unscented_scheme : public Linrz_kalman_filter, public Functional_filter
00071 {
00072 private:
00073     std::size_t q_max;          // Maxiumum size allocated for noise model, constructed before XX
00074 public:
00075     FM::ColMatrix XX;       // Unscented form of state, with associated kappa
00076     Float kappa;
00077 
00078     Unscented_scheme (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_initialsize = 0);
00079     Unscented_scheme& operator= (const Unscented_scheme&);
00080     // Optimise copy assignment to only copy filter state
00081 
00082     void init ();
00083     void init_XX ();
00084     void update ();
00085     void update_XX (Float kappa);
00086 
00087     void predict (Unscented_predict_model& f);
00088     // Efficient Unscented prediction 
00089     void predict (Functional_predict_model& f);
00090     void predict (Addative_predict_model& f);
00091     Float predict (Linrz_predict_model& f)
00092     {   // Adapt to use the more general addative model
00093         predict(static_cast<Addative_predict_model&>(f));
00094         return 1.;      // Always well condition for addative predict
00095     }
00096     
00097     Float observe (Uncorrelated_addative_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z);
00098     Float observe (Correlated_addative_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z);
00099     // Unscented filter implements general addative observe models 
00100     
00101     Float observe (Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z)
00102     {   // Adapt to use the more general addative model
00103         return observe (static_cast<Uncorrelated_addative_observe_model&>(h),z);
00104     }
00105     Float observe (Linrz_correlated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z)
00106     {   // Adapt to use the more general addative model
00107         return observe (static_cast<Correlated_addative_observe_model&>(h),z);
00108     }
00109 
00110 public:                     // Exposed Numerical Results
00111     FM::Vec s;                  // Innovation
00112     FM::SymMatrix S, SI;        // Innovation Covariance and Inverse
00113 
00114 protected:
00115     virtual Float predict_Kappa (std::size_t size) const;
00116     virtual Float observe_Kappa (std::size_t size) const;
00117     /* unscented Kappa values
00118        default uses the rule which minimise mean squared error of 4th order term
00119     */
00120 
00121 protected:                  // allow fast operation if z_size remains constant
00122     std::size_t last_z_size;
00123     void observe_size (std::size_t z_size);
00124 
00125 private:
00126     void unscented (FM::ColMatrix& XX, const FM::Vec& x, const FM::SymMatrix& X, Float scale);
00127     /* Determine Unscented points for a distribution */
00128     std::size_t x_size;
00129     std::size_t XX_size;    // 2*x_size+1
00130 
00131 protected:                  // Permenantly allocated temps
00132     FM::ColMatrix fXX;
00133 };
